data.name: After the Fall - Arizona Sunshine Pack
data.detailed_description:
After the Fall - Arizona Sunshine® pack:
  • Arizona Sunshine® weapon skins
  • Arizona Sunshine® gear
  • Arizona Sunshine® badge

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-7500 / Ryzen 5 1600 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / RX 580 equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Additional Notes: VR Headset required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • DirectX: Version 11
